content:
Anyone else getting a bunch of new IG Publisher errors regarding canonical URLs?
Error: SD_ED_TYPE_PROFILE_WRONG_TARGET.
This seemed to have worked with the publisher version available just 24 hours ago (v1.1.72), but just updating to v1.1.74 causes all kinds of new errors that did not exist on an otherwise untouched IG.

Examples:
Profile http://hl7.org/fhir/StructureDefinition/Questionnaire is for type StructureDefinition[http://hl7.org/fhir/StructureDefinition/Questionnaire], which is not a Canonical Resource (which is required because the CarePlan.activity.detail.instantiatesCanonical element has type canonical)

Profile http://hl7.org/fhir/StructureDefinition/StructureDefinition is for type StructureDefinition[http://hl7.org/fhir/StructureDefinition/StructureDefinition], which is not a Canonical Resource (which is required because the ExplanationOfBenefit.meta.profile element has type canonical)
which IG? I fixed a bug, and it's obviously uncovered another bug.
I am working on Carin BB, but have not committed yet. I see similar issues on numerous IGs that were built today.
the latest build for specialty-rx just sprung 6 new errors; am I ok to continue with publication @grahame?
sigh. a fix is on the way.
The issue seems to be resolved with IG Publisher v1.1.75. Thanks much.

Since v1.1.74 we see an issue on Bundle profiles pointing to Composition resources. with v1.1.73 there were no errors in the build on this topics. the error can be seen in the IG here: http://build.fhir.org/ig/ehealthsuisse/ch-vacd/qa.html#_scratch_ig-build-temp-EIYLYM_repo_input_resources_structuredefinition_ch-vacd-document-immunization-administration
